title: Direct X error patch 7.11
body:
No problems in champ select, go to load into game. Direct X error... ZZZ

Ideas? WIN10 All graphics drivers and DirectX up to date.

replies.body:
I've seen a number of AMD card users having this weird directx error. Some players have been able to get around it by going through [**these steps**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/x6ylTzIT-5172017-directx-issues-with-amdradeon-graphics-cards). 

If you aren't running an AMD, we might be able to work around this by resetting your [**graphics card software**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684#wq4) but make sure to go through the rest of those steps as well!

didnt help, 3rd time its happend, new motherboard directx fail, vidcard directxfail, updates directxfail, but everything is the same on the HDD directx up-to-date and all drivers updated... 2x it helped fully reinstalling league... but i dont feel like doing that today :/

AMD users just turn on gpu scaling and restart everything but it brings the same error
Clean install and reset nVidia software, same error.
